Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\Tiago\\OneDrive\\√Årea de Trabalho\\GALERIA" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: robust CDE catalog sync + MongoDB fallback system

- Catalog sync now uses per-category queries \(8 small queries vs 1 giant\)
- Added 15s timeout per category to prevent ECONNRESET
- Added MongoDB fallback when CDE cache fails completely
- Physical stock sync from CDE runs every 30min \(production only\)
- Logical stock sync runs every 5min \(cart reservations\)
- Cache now has 479 products with proper fallback chain
- Various CSS/JS improvements and bug fixes

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
